Document: # Rule 1.1 Do not attempt to evade bans, ahelp questioning, or punishments. Do not abuse the ahelp system. - Ban evading using an alternate account or other means will result in an immediate voucher ban. - Evading ahelp questioning by disconnecting upon being ahelped, during questioning, or ignoring the admin will usually end in an appeal ban. - Attempting to get around role bans by being promoted to that role in-game will lead to a game ban. - Spamming or being aggressive to our admins in ahelps will result in an appeal ban.
